text: Béla Nyitrai was a male Hungarian international table tennis player. He won a bronze medal at the 1934 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's doubles with István Boros. He was of Jewish origin and was a National champion of Hungary. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Hungarian male table tennis players Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Béla Nyitrai
